description: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.

name: Carnivine
description: Hanging from branches using its tentacles, it looks like a plant. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down.

name: Finneon
description: Its double tail fins propel its energetic jumps. When it breaks the surface of the sea, Wingull swoop down to grab it on the fly.

name: Lumineon
description: Lumineon swimming in the darkness of the deep sea look like stars shining in the night sky. It competes for food with Lanturn.

name: Mantyke
description: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.

name: Snover
description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. Seemingly curious about people, they gather around footsteps they find on snowy mountains.

name: Abomasnow
description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”

name: Weavile
description: They travel in groups of four or five, leaving signs for one another on trees and rocks. They bring down their prey with coordinated attacks.

name: Magnezone
description: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin, while transmitting its own signals of unknown purpose.

name: Lickilicky
description: The long tongue is always soggy with slobber. The saliva contains a solvent that causes numbness. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

name: Rhyperior
description: It can launch a rock held in its hand like a missile by tightening and then expanding its muscles instantaneously. Geodude are shot at rare times.

name: Tangrowth
description: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Even if one of its arms is eaten, it's fine. The Pokémon regenerates quickly and will go right back to normal.

name: Electivire
description: When it gets excited, it thumps its chest. With every thud, thunder roars, electric sparks shower all around and blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.

name: Magmortar
description: According to whatwn, a single pair of male and female Magmortar lives in one volcano. From its arm, it launches fireballs hotter than 3,600ºF.

name: Togekiss
description: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings. It will never appear where there is strife.

name: Yanmega
description: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. It is adept at biting apart foes while flying by at high speed.

name: Leafeon
description: Its cellular composition is closer to that of a plant than an animal. It uses photosynthesis to produce its energy supply without eating food.

name: Glaceon
description: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.

name: Gliscor
description: Gliscor observes prey while hanging upside down from branches. Its flight is soundless. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

name: Mamoswine
description: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. It woke up to much amazement. This Pokémon has been around for a long, long, long time.

name: Porygon_Z
description: In order to create a more advanced Pokémon, an additional program was installed, but apparently it contained a defect that made it move oddly.

name: Gallade
description: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows when trying to protect someone. It can sense what its foe is thinking.

name: Probopass
description: It freely controls three units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force. With them, it can attack its foes from three directions.

name: Dusknoir
description: This feared Pokémon is said to travel to worlds unknown. Some even believe that it takes lost spirits into its pliant body and guides them home.

name: Froslass
description: When it finds people or Pokémon it likes, it freezes them and takes them to its chilly den, where they become its decorations.

name: Rotom
description: Research continues on this Pokémon. Its electric-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control, in order to make mischief.

name: Uxie
description: Known as ”The Being of Knowledge,” according to some sources, this Pokémon provided people with the intelligence necessary to solve various problems.

name: Mesprit
description: Although it slumbers at the bottom of a lake, its spirit is said to leave its body and flitter on the water surface. It taught humans of sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: Azelf
description: This Pokémon is said to have endowed humans with the determination needed to do things. It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit and Azelf all came from the same egg.

name: Dialga
description: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It completely controls the flow of time. It uses its power to travel at will through the past and future.

name: Palkia
description: Palkia has the ability to distort space. Its total control over the boundaries of space enable it to transport itself to faraway places and other dimensions.

name: Heatran
description: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It dwells in volcanic caves, using its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: Regigigas
description: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon shaped Regirock, Regice, and Registeel out of clay, ice, and magma.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange. It was banished for its violence.

name: Cresselia
description: Those who sleep holding one of Cresselia's feathers are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Phione
description: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs. It always returns to where it was born.

name: Manaphy
description: makes up 80% of its body. It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Darkrai
description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers. However, it means no harm.

name: Shaymin
description: The flowers all over its body burst into bloom if it is lovingly hugged and senses gratitude. The blooming of Gracideas confers the power of flight upon it.

name: Arceus
description: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world, before the universe even existed.

name: Victini
description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

name: Snivy
description: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.

name: Servine
description: When it gets dirty, its leaves can't be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps clean. They avoid attacks by sinking into the shadows of thick foliage.

name: Serperior
description: They raise their heads to intimidate foes, but only give it their all when fighting powerful opponents who are not fazed by the glare from its noble eyes.

name: Tepig
description: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp. It blows fire through its nose.

name: Pignite
description: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. When it is angered, the intensity of the flame increases.

name: Emboar
description: It is adept at using many different moves. It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Oshawott
description: The scalchop on its stomach isn't just used for battle, it can be used to break open hard berries as well. It is made from the same element as its claws.

name: Dewott
description: Strict training and disclipine leads it to master its flowing double-scalchop technique. Scalchop techniques differ from one Dewott to another.

name: Samurott
description: One swing of the seamitars attached to its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them is enough to intimidate most enemies.

name: Patrat
description: Extremely cautious, they take shifts to maintain a constant watch of their nest. Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days.

name: Watchog
description: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents. Keen eyesight lets them see in the dark.

name: Lillipup
description: It faces strong opponents with great courage. Because it doesn't yelp, it's extremely popular with Trainers who live in apartment buildings.

name: Herdier
description: Its dense black fur grows continuously. The high cost of keeping its hard fur properly groomed makes this a troublesome Pokémon to train.

name: Stoutland
description: Intelligent, good-natured, and valiant, there could be no concern that it would ever attack people. Some parents even trust it to babysit.

name: Purrloin
description: Their deceptively cute act is the perfect ruse. They steal from people for fun, but their victims can't help but forgive them.

name: Liepard
description: Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur. These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. They run silently in the night.

name: Pansage
description: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.

name: Simisage
description: Ill tempered, it attacks enemies by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

name: Pansear
description: The fire within the tuft on its head can reach up to 600ºF. Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.

name: Simisear
description: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

name: Panpour
description: The water stored inside the tuft of its head is rich in nutrients. It waters plants using its tail, plants that receive its water grow large.

name: Simipour
description: It can shoot highly-pressurised water from its tail with enough power to break through a solid concrete wall. It prefers places with clean water.

name: Munna
description: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams. Munna always float in the air.

name: Musharna
description: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon. It changes into different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.

name: Pidove
description: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

name: Tranquill
description: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it can always return to its Trainer's location regardless of the distance.

name: Unfezant
description: Males have plumage on their heads. The females' flying abilities surpass those of the males. They will only let themselves feel close to their Trainers.

name: Blitzle
description: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate with one another.

name: Zebstrika
description: When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates. It is dangerous when it's angry as it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

name: Roggenrola
description: The hexagonal cavity is its ear. It walks in the direction of sounds it hears, but if the sounds cease, it panics and topples over.

name: Boldore
description: Its orange crystal is a mass of energy. Just one crystal fragment would provide enough fuel for a hundred dump trucks. When it is healthy, its core sticks out.

name: Gigalith
description: The blasts of energy it makes from sunbeams have terrifying power. However, it's not able to fire its blasts at night or on rainy days.

name: Woobat
description: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. Suction from its nostrils enables it to stick to cave walls during sleep. It leaves a heart-shaped mark behind.

name: Swoobat
description: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.

name: Drilbur
description: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph by spinning its body. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.

name: Excadrill
description: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels, but it can also help with construction.

name: Audino
description: Its auditory sense is astounding. Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.

name: Timburr
description: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

name: Gurdurr
description: They strengthen their bodies by carrying steel beams. This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

name: Conkeldurr
description: They use concrete pillars as walking canes. Rather than rely solely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

name: Tympole
description: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk and warns others of danger.

name: Palpitoad
description: It lives in the water and on land. When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

name: Seismitoad
description: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. They can also shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps.

name: Throh
description: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts. It changes belts as it gets more powerful.

name: Sawk
description: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train. Disturbing their training angers them.

name: Sewaddle
description: It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth. Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes, it is a mascot for fashion designers.

name: Swadloon
description: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

name: Leavanny
description: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to weave warm wrappings for Sewaddle by using the silk secreted from its mouth.

name: Venipede
description: Using the feelers on its head and tail, it picks up vibrations in the air to determine its prey's location and state. It is brutally aggressive.

name: Whirlipede
description: Storing energy for evolution, it sits. But when attacked, it spins its body at high speed like a wheel and then crashes furiously into its opponent.

name: Scolipede
description: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails. Then it finishes them off with deadly poison.

name: Cottonee
description: When it finds others of its kind, they all stick together. When enough of them have collected, the mass resembles a cumulonimbus cloud.

name: Whimsicott
description: It rides on the wind and slips into people's homes. After it has turned a room into a cotton-filled mess, it giggles to itself and takes off.

name: Petilil
description: By pruning the leaves on its head with regularity, this Pokémon can be grown into a fine plump shape. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.

name: Lilligant
description: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. It withers away if a trainer does not take good care of it.

name: Basculin
description: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school. These Pokémon are very hostile.

name: Sandile
description: It conceals itself in the sand and chomps down on the legs of any prey that unwarily walk over it. Its favorite food is Trapinch.

name: Krokorok
description: They move in groups of a few individuals. Thanks to the special membrane covering its eyes, it can see its surroundings clearly, even in the dead of night.

name: Krookodile
description: Very violent Pokémon, they never allow their prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

name: Darumaka
description: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it pulls its limbs into its body and falls asleep.

name: Darmanitan
description: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it transforms into a stone statue. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind and fights on mentally.

name: Maractus
description: Arid regions are their habitat. When it moves rhythmically, it makes a sound similar to maracas, making the surprised Pokémon flee.

name: Dwebble
description: It makes a hole in a stone of a suitable size. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.

name: Crustle
description: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle and begins to weaken.

name: Scraggy
description: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck. Its skull is massively thick.

name: Scrafty
description: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader, and is the most respected.

name: Sigilyph
description: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders. They use their psychic power to attack enemies.

name: Yamask
description: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves in past ages. Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human.

name: Cofagrigus
description: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies. Their bodies are covered in pure gold.

name: Tirtouga
description: Reputed to be the ancestor of most turtle Pokémon, it lived in warm seas about a hundred million years ago. It was restored from a fossil.

name: Carracosta
description: They can live both in the ocean and on land. Incredible jaw strength enables them to chew up steel beams and rocks along with their prey.

name: Archen
description: Said to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon, Archen itself could not actually fly but moved by hopping from treetop to treetop.

name: Archeops
description: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. When one Archeops had the prey cornered, another would swoop on it.

name: Trubbish
description: It gorges on trash until its stomach is full. Then it belches toxic gas. An unlucky whiff of this gas will put a person in the hospital.

name: Garbodor
description: Beware the poisonous liquid it shoots from its right arm. If even a little of it gets on you, you'll experience the full effects of this unidentified toxin.

name: Zorua
description: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.

name: Zoroark
description: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents. They defend their lair with illusory scenery.

name: Minccino
description: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

name: Cinccino
description: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that repels dust and helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.

name: Gothita
description: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, Gothita are looking at something that only they can see. Their ribbonlike feelers increase their power.

name: Gothorita
description: Starlight is the source of their power. They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading them astray are told in every corner.

name: Gothitelle
description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power. When it learns its Trainer's life span, it cries in sadness.

name: Solosis
description: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: Duosion
description: When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximized psychic power.

name: Reuniclus
description: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains.

name: Ducklett
description: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles. The one in the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: Vanillite
description: The temperature of their breath is -58ºF. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them. Vanillite is treasured by households in warm regions.

name: Vanillish
description: Vanillish has existed since the Ice Age. It controls particles of ice, freezes its opponents, and then shatters them with a headbutt.

name: Vanilluxe
description: Each of its two heads has a brain, and when they are in agreement, it attacks its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard. It makes snow clouds inside its body.

name: Deerling
description: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well. People use it to mark the seasons.

name: Sawsbuck
description: Some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring because the plants growing on its horns change according to the season. The leader possesses magnificent horns.

name: Emolga
description: It glides using its cape-like membrane. It grills berries and bug Pokémon with electric shocks from the pouches on its cheeks and makes a meal of them.

name: Karrablast
description: When they feel threatened, they spit an acidic liquid to drive attackers away. For some reason they evolve while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances. The steel armor protects their whole body.

name: Foongus
description: It lures Pokémon in with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases its poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

name: Amoonguss
description: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.

name: Frillish
description: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap an opponent, that foe will be dragged five miles below the surface to its lair, never to return.

name: Jellicent
description: They propel themselves by expelling absorbed seawater from their bodies. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

name: Alomomola
description: When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore. The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.

name: Joltik
description: Since they can't generate their own electricity, they attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in a pouch.

name: Galvantula
description: It creates barriers from electrified silk that stun foes. This works as a weapon as well as a defense. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.

name: Ferroseed
description: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling of caves. When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes.

name: Ferrothorn
description: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.

name: Klink
description: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

name: Klang
description: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. Spinning minigears are rotated at high speed and repeatedly fired away. It is dangerous if the gears don't return.

name: Klinklang
description: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

name: Tynamo
description: These Pokémon move in schools. One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.

name: Eelektrik
description: These Pokémon have a big appetite. It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.

name: Eelektross
description: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean, with their sucker mouths.

name: Elgyem
description: It psychically squeezes the brain of its foe, causing unendurable headaches. Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

name: Beheeyem
description: It can manipulate an opponent's memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.

name: Litwick
description: While Litwick shines a light and pretends to be a guide, it absorbs the life force of any who follow it, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

name: Lampent
description: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen. The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire.

name: Chandelure
description: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

name: Axew
description: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly, harder and sturdier than the last.

name: Fraxure
description: Their tusks can shatter rocks. A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

name: Haxorus
description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams.

name: Cubchoo
description: Its nose is always running. Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.

name: Beartic
description: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

name: Cryogonal
description: They are born in snow clouds. When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.

name: Shelmet
description: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast.

name: Accelgor
description: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in layers of thin membrane. It is very light and fights with ninja-like movements.

name: Stunfisk
description: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

name: Mienfoo
description: They have mastered elegant combos. As they concentrate, their battle moves become swifter and more precise. What it lacks in power, it makes up for in quantity.

name: Mienshao
description: They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

name: Druddigon
description: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move. It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.

name: Golett
description: These Pokémon are thought to have been created by the science of an ancient and mysterious civilization. It's been active for thousands of years.

name: Golurk
description: Golurk were created to protect people and Pokémon by an ancient civilisation. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

name: Pawniard
description: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey. If battling dulls them, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

name: Bisharp
description: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.

name: Bouffalant
description: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.

name: Rufflet
description: With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also consumes berries, it's a carnivore at heart.

name: Braviary
description: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if it is injured. One can carry a car while flying.

name: Vullaby
description: It can't fly yet and must wait until its wings have developed more. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

name: Mandibuzz
description: They adorn themselves beautifully with bones. This is supposedly an effort to attract males, but no male Mandibuzz have ever been found.

name: Heatmor
description: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. They burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.

name: Durant
description: Durant dig nests in mountains. Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.

name: Deino
description: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

name: Zweilous
description: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves on to another area. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.

name: Hydreigon
description: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.

name: Larvesta
description: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. It spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

name: Volcarona
description: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it appeared and saved Pokémon from freezing, Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: Cobalion
description: It has a body and heart of steel. This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.

name: Terrakion
description: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

name: Virizion
description: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Legends say this Pokémon used whirlwind-like movements to confound and swiftly cut its opponents.

name: Tornadus
description: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power can blow entire houses away. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: Thundurus
description: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. Countlesed remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.

name: Reshiram
description: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

name: Zekrom
description: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It has a generator that creates electricity in its tail. It assists those with strong ideals.

name: Landorus
description: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size. It has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

name: Kyurem
description: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals. Its body became frozen when its energy leaked out.

name: Keldeo
description: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers.

name: Meloetta
description: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad. Many famous songs have been inspired by the tunes that Meloetta plays.

name: Genesect
description: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: Chespin
description: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock without any effort.

name: Quilladin
description: They strengthen the sturdy shell covering their bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights, but will counterattack with sharp quills.

name: Chesnaught
description: It shields its allies from danger with its own body. When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it can withstand a bomb blast.

name: Fennekin
description: As it walks, it munches on a twig to fill itself with energy in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its roomy ears.

name: Braixen
description: Braixen has a twig stuck in its tail. When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

name: Delphox
description: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future. It uses psychic power to incinerate its foes.

name: Froakie
description: It protects its skin by covering its body in bubbles it secretes from its chest and back. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: Frogadier
description: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away. Frogadier's swiftness is unparalleled.

name: Greninja
description: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars made of compressed water.

name: Bunnelby
description: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly. Bunnelby dig the whole night through.

name: Diggersby
description: With its powerful ears it reduces dense bedrock to rubble. It can be a big help at construction sites. When it's finished digging, it lounges about lazily.

name: Fletchling
description: This amiable Pokémon is easy to train. But when battle is joined, it shows its ferocious side. It's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

name: Fletchinder
description: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on any bewildered Pokémon that pop out of the grass.

name: Talonflame
description: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

name: Scatterbug
description: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact. Scatterbug can live in any region or climate.

name: Spewpa
description: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

name: Vivillon
description: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

name: Litleo
description: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to start a fight.

name: Pyroar
description: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride. The females protect the pride's cubs. They viciously threaten any challenger.

name: Flabebe
description: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats on the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.

name: Floette
description: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance. It draws out the power of flowers to battle.

name: Florges
description: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory. In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create gardens to embellish the castle domains.

name: Skiddo
description: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn't need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back. It has a placid disposition.

name: Gogoat
description: It can tell how its trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathetic sense lets them run as if one being. They inhabit mountainous regions.

name: Pancham
description: There's no point to the leaf in its mouth, aside from an effort to look cool. It's mischievous, so it's not well suited to inexperienced Trainers.

name: Pangoro
description: It boasts superb physical strength. Those who wish to become Pangoro's Trainer have no choice but to converse with their fists.

name: Furfrou
description: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements. These Pokémon were the guardians of kings.

name: Espurr
description: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself. The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears.

name: Meowstic
description: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

name: Honedge
description: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.

name: Doublade
description: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords. The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even against those skilled at swordplay.

name: Aegislash
description: Generations of kings were attended to by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.

name: Spritzee
description: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked. Its fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

name: Aromatisse
description: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

name: Swirlix
description: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy. To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes sticky white threads.

name: Slurpuff
description: Slurpuff can distinguish even the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

name: Inkay
description: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

name: Malamar
description: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids. It forces others to do whatever it wants.

name: Binacle
description: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

name: Barbaracle
description: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.

name: Skrelp
description: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, it hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution. They spray liquid poison on prey that approach unawares.

name: Dragalge
description: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker. Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.

name: Clauncher
description: Through controlled expulsions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can even shatter large rocks.

name: Clawitzer
description: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its enormous claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots. They launch cannonballs made of water.

name: Helioptile
description: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their own energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

name: Heliolisk
description: A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper. It can stimulate its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs.

name: Tyrunt
description: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up a car. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

name: Tyrantrum
description: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

name: Amaura
description: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years. It lived in a cold land where there were no predators.

name: Aurorus
description: Using the diamond-shaped crystals on its body it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack, or encase them in ice.

name: Sylveon
description: Its ribbonlike feelers give off an aura that weakens hostility in its prey, causing them to let down their guard. A moment later, it pounces.

name: Hawlucha
description: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. Its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

name: Dedenne
description: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.

name: Carbink
description: Born from the high temperatures and pressures deep underground, it defends itself by firing beams from the jewel part of its body.

name: Goomy
description: Its source of protection is its slimy, germ-laden mucous membrane. Anyone who touches it will need some thorough hand-washing.

name: Sliggoo
description: This Pokémon's mucous can dissolve anything. Toothless, it sprays mucous on its prey. Once they're nicely dissolved, it slurps them up.

name: Goodra
description: It gets picked on because it's meek. But then, whoever teased it gets to feel the full force of its horns and a good swatting from its thick tail.

name: Klefki
description: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them. It will sneak into people's homes to steal their keys.

name: Phantump
description: According to legend, medicine to cure any illness can be made by plucking the green leaves on its head, brewing them, and boiling down the liquid.

name: Trevenant
description: Through its roots, it exerts control over other trees. A deadly curse falls upon anyone cutting down trees in forests where Trevenant dwell.

name: Pumpkaboo
description: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.

name: Gourgeist
description: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song will become inflicted with a curse.

name: Bergmite
description: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice. They live in herds on snowy mountains.

name: Avalugg
description: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back make it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

name: Noibat
description: They live in pitch-black caves. Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.

name: Noivern
description: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles.

name: Xerneas
description: Legends say that when the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is sharing everlasting life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree

name: Yveltal
description: When its life comes to an end, its wings and tail spread wide and glow red, and it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon.

name: Zygarde
description: It's said to be monitoring the ecosystem from deep in the caves where it lives. There are rumors that even greater power lies hidden within its cells.

name: Diancie
description: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world. It creates diamonds between its hands.

name: Hoopa
description: In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. When its powers are sealed away, it is transformed into a much smaller form. It teleports things to a secret place.

name: Volcanion
description: It lets out billows of steam from the arms on its back and disappears into the dense fog. It's said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

name: Rowlet
description: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night. Silently it glides, drawing near to its target.

name: Dartrix
description: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.

name: Decidueye
description: Decidueye is cool and cautious. It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances of over a hundred yards.

name: Litten
description: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it.

name: Torracat
description: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire. With a single punch, it can bend an iron bar right over.

name: Incineroar
description: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it's not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer's orders with complete nonchalance.

name: Popplio
description: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It practices diligently so it can learn to make big bubbles.

name: Brionne
description: It cares deeply for its companions. When its Trainer is feeling down, it performs a cheery dance with a sequence of water balloons  to try and help.

name: Primarina
description: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.

name: Pikipek
description: This Pokémon feeds on berries, whose leftover seeds become the ammunition for the attacks it fires off from its mouth. It uses holes in trees for nesting.

name: Trumbeak
description: By bending its beak, it can produce a variety of calls and brand itself a noisy nuisance for its neighbors. It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak.

name: Toucannon
description: When it battles, within its beak, its internal gases ignite, explosively launching seeds with enough power to pulverize boulders.

name: Yungoos
description: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It wanders around in a never-ending search for food. At dusk, it collapses and falls asleep on the spot.

name: Gumshoos
description: When it finds a trace of its preatiently stakes out the location... but as it's diurnal, it's always snoozing by nightfall.

name: Grubbin
description: They often gather near places frequented by electric Pokémon in order to avoid being attacked by bird Pokémon, though it normally lives underground.

name: Charjabug
description: From the food it digests, it generates electricity, and it stores this energy in its electric sac. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.

name: Vikavolt
description: It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its foes. It overwhelms bird Pokémon with shocking beams of electrical energy.

name: Crabrawler
description: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.

name: Crabominable
description: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew thick fur.

name: Oricorio
description: Oricorio can change its body by sipping different coloured nectar. It's enemies' hearts melt at the sight of its varying, beautiful dances.

name: Cutiefly
description: Myriads of Cutiefly flutter above the heads of people who haveresembling those of flowers. It can identify which flowers are about to bloom.

name: Ribombee
description: Ribombee rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle. They are sometimes sold as supplements.

name: Rockruff
description: This Pokémon has lived with people since times long ago. It can sense when its Trainer is in the dumps and will stick close by its Trainer's side.

name: Lycanroc
description: Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons. It will attack with no regard for its own safety.

name: Wishiwashi
description: When it's in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.

name: Mareanie
description: It's found crawling on beaches and seafloors. The coral that grows on Corsola's head is as good as a five-star banquet to this Pokémon.

name: Toxapex
description: Those attacked by Toxapex's poison will suffer intense pain for three days and three nights. Post-recovery, there will be some aftereffects.

name: Mudbray
description: The mud stuck to Mudbray's hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait. Eating dirt, making mud, and playing in the mire form its daily routine.

name: Mudsdale
description: Its heavy, mud-covered kicks are its best means of attack, and it can reduce large trucks to scrap without breaking a sweat.

name: Dewpider
description: It crawls onto the land in search of food. When it comes across enemies or potential prey, this Pokémon smashes its water-bubble-covered head into them.

name: Araquanid
description: Despite what its appearance suggests, it cares for others. If it finds vulnerable, weak Pokémon, it protectively brings them into its water bubble.

name: Fomantis
description: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. They give off a sweet and refreshing scent. Cutiefly often gather near the tall grass where Fomantis are hiding.

name: Lurantis
description: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis's vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.

name: Morelull
description: As it drowses the day away, it nourishes itself by sucking from tree roots. It wakens at the fall of night, wandering off in search of a new tree.

name: Shiinotic
description: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.

name: Salandit
description: It burns its bodily fluids to create a sweet-smelling poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.

name: Salazzle
description: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit to live with. Its poisonous gas is filled with pheromones.

name: Stufful
description: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling. It's an incredibly dangerous Pokémon.

name: Bewear
description: This Pokémon has the habit of hugging its companions. Many Trainers have left this world after their spines were squashed by its hug.

name: Bounsweet
description: A delectable aroma pours from its body.  Bounsweet's sweat can be watered down into a juice with just the right amount of sweetness.

name: Steenee
description: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.

name: Tsareena
description: Its long, striking legs aren't just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.

name: Comfey
description: It attaches flowers to its nutritious vine. Baths prepared with the flowers from its vine have a relaxing effect, so this Pokémon is a hit wy people.

name: Oranguru
description: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.

name: Passimian
description: They battle with hard berries for weapons. They form groups of about 20 individuals. Their techniques are passed from the boss to the group, generation upon generation.

name: Wimpod
description: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake. It lives on beaches and seabeds.

name: Golisopod
description: It battles skillfully with its six arms, with a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater--or even air--right in two.

name: Sandygast
description: It takes control of anyone who puts a hand in its mouth, to add to the accumulation of its sand-mound body. This Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

name: Palossand
description: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.

name: Pyukumuku
description: It lives in shallow seas, such as areas near a beach. The sticky mucous that covers their bodies can be used to soothe sunburned skin. How convenient!

name: Type_Null
description: Due to the danger that this synthetic Pokémon may go on a rampage, it wears a control mask to restrain its capabilities. It has some hidden special power.

name: Silvally
description: Its trust in its partner awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type by equipping special memories, a trait that is well displayed in battle.

name: Minior
description: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell encasing its body grows too heavy. It was born from mutated nanoparticles.

name: Komala
description: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

name: Turtonator
description: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point. It gushes fire from its nostrils.

name: Togedemaru
description: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.

name: Mimikyu
description: A lonely Pokémon, it hides its terrifying appearance beneath an old rag so it can get closer to people and other Pokémon. Its actual appearance is unknown.

name: Bruxish
description: It stuns its prey with its psychic powers and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder's shell is no match for it.

name: Drampa
description: This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.

name: Dhelmise
description: The soul of seaweed adrift in the waves became reborn as this Pokémon. It maintains itself with new infusions of seabed detritus and seaweed.

name: Jangmo_O
description: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o live. They grow little by little battling one another.

name: Hakamo_O
description: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder each time they're regrown. Its scaly punches tear its foes to shreds.

name: Kommo_O
description: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other valuable commodities.

name: Tapu_Koko
description: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later.

name: Tapu_Lele
description: A fragrant aroma of flowers follows it. As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health.

name: Tapu_Bulu
description: It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth. It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around at its enemies.

name: Tapu_Fini
description: People say it can create pure water that will wash away any corruption. The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies.

name: Cosmog
description: In ages past, it was called the child of the stars. It's said to be a Pokémon from another world, but no specific details are known.

name: Cosmoem
description: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. There's something accumulating around the black core within its hard shell.

name: Solgaleo
description: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.

name: Lunala
description: When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world. This Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.

name: Nihilego
description: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. It's unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.

name: Buzzwole
description: This life-form called an Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.

name: Pheromosa
description: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.

name: Xurkitree
description: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.

name: Celesteela
description: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. One kind of Ultra Beast, witnesses saw it flying across the sky by expelling gas from its two arms.

name: Kartana
description: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.

name: Guzzlord
description: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. But for some reason its droppings have never been found.

name: Necrozma
description: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.

name: Magearna
description: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak. Its true self is its Soul-Heart, an artificial soul.

name: Marshadow
description: Able to conceal itself in the shadows of others, it never appears before humans, so its very existence is the stuff of myth. This Pokémon is craven and cowering.

name: Poipole
description: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.

name: Naganadel
description: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.

name: Stakataka
description: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life- forms stacked one on top of each other.

name: Blacephalon
description: It slithers toward people and explode its head without warning. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: Zeraora
description: It approaches its enemies at the speed of lightning, then tears them limb from limb with its sharp claws.

name: Meltan
description: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.

name: Melmetal
description: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

name: Grookey
description: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

name: Thwackey
description: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

name: Rillaboom
description: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

name: Scorbunny
description: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon's body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.

name: Raboot
description: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.

name: Cinderace
description: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

name: Sobble
description: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won't be able to resist weeping.

name: Drizzile
description: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

name: Inteleon
description: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

name: Skwovet
description: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.

name: Greedent
description: It stashes berries in its tail--so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn't notice the loss.

name: Rookidee
description: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle--even a defeat increases its strength a bit.

name: Corvisquire
description: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

name: Corviknight
description: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

name: Blipbug
description: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn't.

name: Dottler
description: It barely moves, but it's still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

name: Orbeetle
description: It's famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

name: Nickit
description: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.

name: Thievul
description: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.

name: Gossifleur
description: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.

name: Eldegoss
description: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

name: Wooloo
description: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

name: Dubwool
description: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampYou'll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

name: Chewtle
description: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

name: Drednaw
description: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

name: Yamper
description: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.

name: Boltund
description: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

name: Rolycoly
description: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.

name: Carkol
description: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.

name: Coalossal
description: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Applin
description: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.

name: Flapple
description: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

name: Appletun
description: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.

name: Silicobra
description: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.

name: Sandaconda
description: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.

name: Cramorant
description: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.

name: Arrokuda
description: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It's very proud of that jaw.

name: Barraskewda
description: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda's flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.

name: Toxel
description: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.

name: Toxtricity
description: When this Pokémon sounds as if it's strumming a guitar, it's actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.

name: Sizzlipede
description: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.

name: Centiskorch
description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

name: Clobbopus
description: It's very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

name: Grapploct
description: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

name: Sinistea
description: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.

name: Polteageist
description: This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.

name: Hatenna
description: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures' emotions. If you don't have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.

name: Hattrem
description: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.

name: Hatterene
description: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

name: Impidimp
description: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.

name: Morgrem
description: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it's trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

name: Grimmsnarl
description: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.

name: Obstagoon
description: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout--this move is known as Obstruct.

name: Perrserker
description: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.

name: Cursola
description: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon's core spirit.

name: Sirfetchd
description: Only Farfetch'd that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon's leek withers, it will retire from combat.

name: Mr_Rime
description: It's highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.

name: Runerigus
description: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.

name: Milcery
description: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

name: Alcremie
description: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it's decorated with cream.

name: Falinks
description: Five of them are troopers, and one irass. The brass's orders are absolute.

name: Pincurchin
description: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.

name: Snom
description: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.

name: Frosmoth
description: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than -290 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Stonjourner
description: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun's descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.

name: Eiscue
description: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

name: Indeedee
description: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.

name: Morpeko
description: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It's also generating electricity.

name: Cufant
description: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It's also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.

name: Copperajah
description: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.

name: Dracozolt
description: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.

name: Arctozolt
description: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. Ia hard time walking around.

name: Dracovish
description: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.

name: Arctovish
description: Though it's able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

name: Duraludon
description: Its body resembles polished metal, and it's both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

name: Dreepy
description: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.

name: Drakloak
description: It's capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.

name: Dragapult
description: When it isn't battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

name: Zacian
description: Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.

name: Zamazenta
description: In times past, it worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs metal that it then uses in battle.

name: Eternatus
description: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.

name: Kubfu
description: Kubfu trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.

name: Urshifu
description: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.

name: Zarude
description: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It's incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.

name: Regieleki
description: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It's said that removing the rings on Regieleki's body will unleash the Pokémon's latent power.

name: Regidrago
description: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago's arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.

name: Glastrier
description: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It's also a belligerent Pokémon-- anything it wants, it takes by force.

name: Spectrier
description: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one--it doesn't use its sense of sight. Spectrier's kicks are said to separate soul from body.

name: Calyrex
description: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

name: Rattata_Alolan
description: With ita incisors, it gnamws through doors and infiltrates people's homes. Then with a twitch of its whiskers, it steals whatever food it finds.

name: Raticate_Alolan
description: It forms a group of Rattata, which it assumes command of. Each group has its own territory, and disputes over food happen often.

name: Raichu_Alolan
description: It only evolves to this form in the Alola region. According to researchers, its diet is one of the causes of this change.

name: Sandshrew_Alolan
description: It lives on snowy mountains. Its steel shell is very hard-so much so, it can't roll its body up into a ball.

name: Sandslash_Alolan
description: Fleeing a volcanic eruption, it settled on a snowy mountain. As it races through the snowfields, it sends up a spray of snow.

name: Vulpix_Alolan
description: gVulpixAlolanPokedexText

name: Ninetales_Alolan
description: It creates drops of ice in its coat and showers them over its enemies. Anyone who angers it will be frozen stiff in an instant.

name: Diglett_Alolan
description: Its head sports an altered form of whiskers made of metal. When in communication with its comrades, its whiskers wobble to and fro.

name: Dugtrio_Alolan
description: Its shining gold hair provides it with protection. It's reputed that keeping any of its fallen hairs will bring bad luck.

name: Meowth_Alolan
description: This Pokémon was not originally found in Alola. Human actions caused a surge in their numbers, and they went feral. They're prideful and crafty.

name: Persian_Alolan
description: Its round face and smooth coat-softer than the most high-class velvet-have made this a very popular Pokémon in Alola.

name: Geodude_Alolan
description: Its body is a magnetic stone. Iron sand attaches firmly to the portions of its body that are particularly magnetic.

name: Graveler_Alolan
description: Its preferred food is dravite. After it has eaten this mineral, crystals form inside the Pokémon, rising to the surface of part of its body.

name: Golem_Alolan
description: It fires rocks charged with electricity. Even if the rock isn't fired that accurately, just grazing an opponent will cause numbness and fainting.

name: Grimer_Alolan
description: A Grimer, which had been brought in to solve a problem with garbage, developed over time into this form.

name: Muk_Alolan
description: The garbage it eats causes continuous chemical changes in its body, which produce its exceedingly vivid coloration.

name: Exeggutor_Alolan
description: Alola is the best environment for this Pokémon. Local people take pride in its appearance, saying this is how Exeggutor ought to look.

name: Marowak_Alolan
description: The bones it possesses were once its mother's. Its mother's regrets have become like a vengeful spirit protecting this Pokémon.

name: Meowth_Galarian
description: Living with a savage, seafaring people has toughened this Pokémon's body so much that parts of it have turned to iron.

name: Ponyta_Galarian
description: Its small horn hides a healing power. With a few rubs from this Pokémon's horn, any slight wound you have will be healed.

name: Rapidash_Galarian
description: Little can stand up to its psycho cut. Unleashed from this Pokémon's horn, the move will punch a hole right through a thick metal sheet.

name: Slowpoke_Galarian
description: Although this Pokémon is normally zoned out, its expression abruptly sharpens on occasion. The cause for this seems to lie in Slowpoke's diet.

name: Slowbro_Galarian
description: A Shellder bite set off a chemical reaction with the spices inside Slowbro's body, causing Slowbro to become a Poison-type Pokémon.

name: Farfetchd_Galarian
description: The Farfetch'd of the Galar region are brave warriors, and they wield thick, tough leeks in battle.

name: Weezing_Galarian
description: This Pokémon consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.

name: Mr_Mime_Galarian
description: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.

name: Articuno_Galarian
description: Its feather-like blades are composed of psychic energy and can shear through thick iron sheets as if they were paper.

name: Zapdos_Galarian
description: When its feathers rub together, they produce a crackling sound like the zapping of electricity. That's why this Pokémon is called Zapdos.

name: Moltres_Galarian
description: This Pokémon's sinister, flame-like aura will consume the spirit of any creature it hits. Victims become burned-out shadows of themselves.

name: Slowking_Galarian
description: A combination of toxins and the shock of evolving has increased Shellder's intelligence to the point that Shellder now controls Slowking.

name: Corsola_Galarian
description: Watch your step when wandering areas oceans once covered. What looks like a stone could be this Pokémon, and it will curse you if you kick it.

name: Zigzagoon_Galarian
description: Its restlessness has it constantly running around. If it sees another Pokémon, it will purposely run into them in order to start a fight.

name: Linoone_Galarian
description: It uses its long tongue to taunt opponents. Once the opposition is enraged, this Pokémon hurls itself at the opponent, tackling them forcefully.

name: Darumaka_Galarian
description: It lived in snowy areas for so long that its fire sac cooled off and atrophied. It now has an organ that generates cold instead.

name: Darmanitan_Galarian
description: On days when blizzards blow through, it comes down to where people live. It stashes food in the snowball on its head, taking it home for later.

name: Yamask_Galarian
description: A clay slab with cursed engravings took possession of a Yamask. The slab is said to be absorbing the Yamask's dark power.

name: Stunfisk_Galarian
description: Living in mud with a high iron content has given it a strong steel body.
